content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good day, Maria. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. However, as a landlord, I must ensure that I am getting the best possible price for my property. Could you please specify the rental price you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Dear Maria, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I must admit that your proposed rental price of 1000 Euros per month is lower than what I was expecting. As a landlord, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. Would you be open to negotiating the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, of course. I can increase my offer to 1200 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?

I also want to make sure that my landlord is satisfied with my agreement. I am a responsible and dependable person, so I am sure I will pay rent on time and take care of the property.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Maria. Your increased offer of 1200 Euros per month is certainly more in line with what I was expecting. As a landlord, I am pleased to hear that you are a responsible and dependable person, and I appreciate your commitment to paying rent on time and taking care of the property. Based on our discussion, I agree to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
